description.narrative: The project is expected to have the following development impact: (i) Increase Access to finance: The project will increase access to finance underserved SMEs in Cote d''Ivoire, thus supporting the revitalization of the private sector, which will lead to job preservation and creation. (ii) Capacity Building: The project will help build SIB''s capacity strengthen and grow SME banking activities including to sub-segments such as women and agri-businesses. The project will also contribute to build the capaciity of the SMEs themselves that will benefit from the financing. (iii) Replicability within Cote d''Ivoire: The project will have a demonstration effect by encouraging other local financial institutions to increase lending activities to SMEs. (iv) Replicability within AWB network of African subsidiaries: The project is also expected to have a demonstration effect by encouraging other SSA subsidiaries of the AWB network to increase lending activities to SMEs in their respective markets.

The proposed project is a Risk Sharing Facility of up to XOF 20 billion to support SME lending in Côte dIvoire for Société Ivoirienne de Banque (SIB or the Bank), a subsidiary of the Attijariwafa Bank Group (AWB or the Group). The risk sharing facility investment is combined with proposed advisory services to the Bank to help SIB strengthen its SME banking activities and to the SMEs themselves to improve their capacity and business skills. SIB is the fifth largest bank in the country in terms of loans (8.9%) and seventh largest bank in terms of deposits (7.8%), with a network of 43 branches. The Bank has a universal bank business model servicing the retail, SME and corporate business segments.

participating-org.narrative: RISK SHARING FACILITY SOCIETE IVOIRIENNE DE BANQUE S.A

name.narrative: The project will focus on providing access to finance for SMEs in Cote dIvoire. The Bank is headquartered in Abidjan, Cote dIvoire and has 43 branches in major cities across the country. More than 85% of the economic activity in Cote dIvoire is concentrated in the South of the country.
